%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId} DELETE 删除一个Experiment

=/ab/experiments/{experimentId} DELETE=

==功能 ==
删除一个 `Experiment`

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{experimentId}

==HTTP请求方式==
DELETE

==请求参数==
| 参数名       | 参数类型 | 值     | 描述                         |
|--------------|----------|--------|------------------------------|
| experimentId | 路径参数 | 数字型 | 要删除的 `Experiment` 的id号 |


==返回格式==
无

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -v -X delete https://baseurl/experiments/6
  }}}

==返回结果==
| 状态 | 结果     |
|------|----------|
| 200  | 删除成功 |
